addon_query: Which food item would you like to order?
anything_else: Do you want to order anaything else, Press 1 to add another order  or 2 to complete the current order
invalid_anything_else: Press 1 to add another order  or 2 to complete the current order
call_forwarding: I am Sorry , I didn't quite get that , please wait while I transfer to my manager.
connecting_manager: Please wait while I transfer to my manager.
food_query: That's great . Happy to serve you, which food item would you like to order
kindly_place: Kindly place your order after the beep
name: Kindly tell your name for more personalized service
order_confirmed: Your order is confirmed and it will be ready in 25 minutes for pick up
order_place_beep: Please proceed with your order after the beep
press1234: Press 1 for takeaway order, 2 for Party Order,  3 for Restaurant timings and location, 4 to Repeat this menu and 0 to talk to the Restaurant Manager.
repeat_option: I didn't get that. Can you repeat?
say_yes_no: After the beep say YES to confirm your order or NO to cancel your order
press_yes_no: Press 1 to confirm the order, 2 to cancel the order or 3 to modify the order
session_closed: Number of attempts exceeds the limit so your session gets closed
specify_one_food: Please specify at least one food item
help: Our Timings are 11:00 am to 10:00 pm Tue-Sunday. We are located at 4 3 5 zero, Main St, Number 160, Frisco, Texas; 7 5 zero 3 3.
quantity_press: Please use the number keypad on the phone to enter the quantity
welcome_press: Welcome to Fidaa indian cusine, my name is LIVA,  Your virtual assistant , Please check out our menu on www.fidaaindiancuisine.com . Please presss 1 to Take Away Order ;,  2 to Party Order;, 3 to know Restaurant timings, 4 to Repeat this menu and 0 to talk to the Restaurant Manager
order_modify: Please proceed with your new order after the beep
confirm_order: Please wait while I confirm the order
call_disconnect: Sorry, We are unable to take your call at the moment. Will come back to you shortly.
